description:
In this Course you will learn the basics of Hooping, this entails the following:

  • Foot Stance and Preparation
  • Waist Hooping in both directions
  • Hoop Control with Hands
  • How to Do Weaves With Your Hoop
  • How to Do the Wallflower
  • How to Do the Twister
  • How to Do the Lasso

This is the perfect course for anyone that has had any interest in Hooping as a form of Dance, Nicole is a professional performer and has been hooping for many years. She is a well known Yoga teacher in our area and has great skill when it comes to leading classes.

Learn How To Hula Hoop and pick up a fun new hobby that is great exercise and also builds balance, hand eye coordination, and burns calories!
title: Learn How To Hula Hoop: Hulahooping 101
